EmailTemplate.name: 06-18-21 BNK Cash Management Webinar Thank You.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for Attending our NCR Cash Management webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Thank you for registering for our “NCR Cash Management webinar”. You can access the presentation slides here <[[https://go.ncr.com/rs/605-BQY-740/images/CM Webinar Slides June2021.pdf]]> and recording link <[[https://ncr.webex.com/ncr/lsr.php?RCID=ab3d2e60cc797fede070f8779a7b2730]]>. If you weren’t able to join don’t worry, the details are all in the presentation. If you attended the session, we hope you saw the tremendous value and enjoyed our expert panel discussion on technology solutions that can help you improve your cash management and save money. Explore our Cash Management solutions <[[https://www.ncr.com/product-catalog/ncr-cash-management-opticash]]> or sign up to our banking customer newsletter <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/contact-us/banking-marketing-opt-in]]>. Get in touch <[[mailto:Robert.Johnston@ncr.com]]> today! <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
